name: cpcbasicts
description: # CPCBasicTS - Run CPC BASIC in a Browser

scripts.copy: cp src/*.html src/*.css LICENSE favicon.ico dist/ && mkdirp -p dist/src && cp -r src/*.ts dist/src && mkdirp -p dist/src/test && cp -r src/test/*.ts dist/src/test && cp src/test/*.html dist/test/ && mkdirp -p dist/examplesTS && cp -r examplesTS/* dist/examplesTS
scripts.build: npm run build:separate && npm run build:one && npm run copy

keywords: CPC BASIC, Locomotive BASIC, Amstrad CPC, Schneider CPC, BASIC Compiler
author: Marco Vieth
